high_descs: Turn around to face the coffee table.
Pick  up the tv remote from the table.
Turn left towards the couch and  turn right towards the box on the couch.
Place the remote to the left of the box.
Turn left towards the end of the couch, turn left to towards the end of the table, and turn right to find the desk in front of you.
Pick up the remote on the desk.
Turn around, walk towards the table, and then turn left towards the couch.
Place the remote to the left of the box on the couch.
anns.task_desc: Place two tv remotes next to the box on the couch.

high_descs: Turn and go to the coffee table.
Pick up the remote control on the coffee table.
Turn and go to the couch.
Put the remote control on the couch.
Turn and go to the table by the picture on the wall.
Pick up the remote control on the table.
Turn around and go to the couch.
Put the remote control on the couch.
anns.task_desc: Move the remote controls from the tables to the couch.

high_descs: Turn around to face the end of the coffee table behind you.
Pick up the remote control from the end of the coffee table.
Go to the sofa on your left and face the cardboard box near the right end of the sofa.
Put the remote control along the left edge of the center seat, near the front.
Turn left and go between the coffee table and brown chair, to face the small desk beyond the brown chair.
Pick up the remote control from the desk.
Go back between the coffee table and brown chair, to the sofa, then face the cardboard box near the right end again.
Put the remote control near the center back of the seat to the left of the box, with the blue end toward you.
anns.task_desc: Move two remote controls to a sofa.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the table with the plant on it.
Pick up the remote control that is on the table.
Turn to the left and go to the couch, then go right to the cardboard box that is on the right side of the couch.
Put the remote control on the left side of the center cushion of the couch.
Go left toward the chair, hang a left, then go right to the table that is on the left side of the chair.
Pick up the remote control that is on the table.
Turn around and go towards the table with the plant on it, hang a left, then hang a right and go to the cardboard box on the couch.
Put the remote control on the couch just to the left of the cardboard box.
anns.task_desc: Put two remote controls on a couch.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the brown table.
Take the remote control from the brown table.
Turn left, go to the couch, turn right, go to the cardboard box on the couch, and turn left.
Put the remote control on the middle cushion of the couch.
Turn left, go to the end of the couch, turn left, go the wall, turn right, and go to the desk.
Take the remote control from the desk.
Turn around, go to the brown table, turn left, go to the couch, turn right, go to the cardboard box on the couch, and turn left.
Put the remote control on the middle cushion of the couch.
anns.task_desc: Put two remote controls on the couch.

high_descs: Move to the coffee table to the left of you
pick up a remote from the table
move to the couch to the left
put the remote on the couch
move to the end table to the left of the arm chair
pick up a remote from the table
move to the couch to the left of the coffee table
put the remote on the couch
anns.task_desc: Put two remotes on the couch.
